Articles.Content:
I have the latest versions of all of these mods:

http://imgur.com/a/Jt7D5

And the sidebar still disappears:

http://imgur.com/a/GwSUC

I have the latest AMD Graphics card update. (Only occurs with OpenGL mode)

Hi crashy

We may not be able to help, openGL mode isn't anything to do with Squad, -force-opengl is a Unity3D built-in command line argument and if it works, great, if it doesn't you need to ask on the Unity3D forums.

All we can really suggest is that you ensure your drivers are up to date which you say they are already, or to try -force-d3d11, but expect graphical issues with any of these forced modes.

The only mode that works properly is the default d3d9*.

*Except on Linux and OS X, where openGL is the default.

Edited March 21, 2015 by sal_vager
